components/header/site-header:
{{> components/header/branding}}
{{> components/common/search-form }}
{{> svg/loading-square}} {{> svg/loading-square}} {{> svg/loading-square}}
{{> components/header/site-utils}}
components/header/branding:
{{#if settings.store_logo.image}} {{else}}

{{settings.store_logo.title}}

{{/if}}
components/common/search-form: {{{snippet 'forms_search'}}}
svg/loading-square:
<svg width="333" height="100" viewBox="0 0 333 100" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <g fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd">
    <path d="M124 29h209v16H124zM124 57h81v15h-81zM0 0h100v100H0z"/>
  </g>
</svg>
components/header/account-button:
{{#if settings.account_creation_enabled}} {{#if customer}}
{{> svg/icon-account}} {{lang 'header.account'}} {{> svg/icon-dropdown}}
  • {{lang 'header.my_account'}}
  • {{lang 'header.my_orders'}}
  • {{lang 'header.log_out'}}
{{else}} {{> svg/icon-account}} {{lang 'header.account'}} {{/if}} {{/if}}
components/header/mini-cart:
{{> svg/icon-cart-empty}} {{> svg/icon-cart-full}}
({{cart.quantity}})
svg/icon-account:
<svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="presentation" title="Account">
  <path d="M18 12.5V12H0v6h1v-5h16v5h1v-5.5zM9 10c-2.76 0-5-2.24-5-5s2.24-5 5-5 5 2.24 5 5-2.24 5-5 5zm0-1c2.21 0 4-1.79 4-4s-1.79-4-4-4-4 1.79-4 4 1.79 4 4 4z" fill="currentColor"/>
</svg>
svg/icon-dropdown:
<svg width="6" height="3" viewBox="0 0 6 3" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <path d="M6 0L3 3 0 0h6z" fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd"/>
</svg>
svg/icon-cart-empty:
<svg width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="presentation" title="Cart">
  <path d="M1 17h16V5H1v12zM0 4h18v14H0V4zm5.126 0H5v1h8V4h-.126a4.002 4.002 0 0 0-7.748 0zM4 5a5 5 0 1 1 10 0H4z" fill="currentColor" />
</svg>
svg/icon-cart-full:
<svg  width="18" height="18" viewBox="0 0 18 18" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" role="presentation">
  <path d="M4.1 4a5.002 5.002 0 0 1 9.8 0H18v14H0V4h4.1zm8.839.163S12.57 1 9 1 5.098 4.163 5.098 4.163h7.84z" fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd"/>
</svg>
